title: Karada Sagashi
overview:
Asuka is a high school student who sees the apparition of a dead 
student named Haruka, asking Asuka to find her body. Asuka and her 
friends attempt to find the eight scattered pieces of Haruka's corpse in
 the school, and learn more about the Red Person that is hunting them as
 they do so. The Red Person hunts students who are alone at school to 
kill them, and until they exit the school gates, the Red Person will 
keep appearing before them. When the Red Person kills a student, it 
scatters the student's body into eight pieces, and tasks another person 
to find the pieces in the school. If Asuka fails to find Haruka's body, 
the day will keep repeating and she and her friends will keep dying 
until they do.
